sentences.en: A curtain acted as a divider between this class and another.
sentences.cn: 帘子作为分隔物将这间教室和另一间分开。

sentences.en: a dance class
sentences.cn: 舞蹈班

sentences.en: a member of the landed class
sentences.cn: 地主阶级的一员

sentences.en: Angela says she longs to join an amateur dramatics class.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉说她渴望参加业余戏剧班。

sentences.en: Cindy’s taking a class on dealing with stress.
sentences.cn: 辛迪在参加一门克服精神压力的课程。

sentences.en: Gary came top of the class in English.
sentences.cn: 加里的英文是班里顶尖的。

sentences.en: Harriet graduated with a first class degree in literature.
sentences.cn: 哈丽雅特毕业时获文学一级学士学位。

sentences.en: He had to spend about six months in a class with younger students.
sentences.cn: 他不得不在一个比他小的学生的班上呆了大约六个月。

sentences.en: He paid for and was assigned a cabin in first class.
sentences.cn: 他付完钱后被安排到了头等舱。

sentences.en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He was injured in a science class.
sentences.cn: 他在一堂科学课上受了伤。

sentences.en: He was not perhaps physically the strongest in the class.
sentences.cn: 他可能不是全班身体最壮的。

sentences.en: He’s not in the same class (= not as good ) as her at tennis.
sentences.cn: 他的网球水平并不如她。

sentences.en: I missed Bible class last week.
sentences.cn: 上周我缺席了《圣经》课。

sentences.en: I would class my garden as medium in size.
sentences.cn: 我的花园只能算是中等大小。

sentences.en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentences.en: Most of the people there are salt-of-the-earth, good, working-class people.
sentences.cn: 那里的大多数人都是吃苦耐劳、心地善良的工人阶级。

sentences.en: She has a first-class brain and is a damned good writer.
sentences.cn: 她头脑相当灵光，是个非常棒的作家。

sentences.en: She was the belle of her Sunday School class.
sentences.cn: 在主日学校她是她们班的班花。

sentences.en: The price includes two economy class airfares from Brisbane to Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 这一价格包括两张从布里斯班到洛杉矶的经济舱机票。

sentences.en: There was very little snobbery or class-consciousness in the wartime navy.
sentences.cn: 战时的海军中很少有势利眼，阶级意识也不强。

sentences.en: Tommy Tune gives the choreography his usual class and zip.
sentences.cn: 汤米·图恩在编排的舞蹈中注入其一贯的优雅和活力。

sentences.en: You can pay to be upgraded to a business class seat.
sentences.cn: 你可以付费升级到商务舱。

words.tran_cn: 无阶级的；不属于任何阶级的

phrases.tran_cn: A（或B，C）类毒品（根据其有害程度和上瘾程度划分为A，B或C类的某种毒品，私藏或出售将导致相应的法律处罚）
(主北美)出类拔萃的人，气质超群的人，出色的事物

phrases.phrase: in a class of (或 on) its (或 one's) own
phrases.tran_cn: （尤指优秀品质、表现）无与伦比的，独一无二的，独具一格的
[口]低劣的；劣等的；不合格的；没地位的
（大学考试成绩）二等；二等舱；二流；（美）二等邮件（定期期刊等）
n. 工人阶级；劳动阶级
世界级，世界水平；一流的

trans.tran_cn: 课（堂），班（级），同届毕业生，等级，阶级，种类，风度
trans.tran_en: a group of people, animals, or things that are considered together because they are similar in some way
one of the different standards of seats, food etc available on a train, aircraft etc
to consider people, things etc as belonging to a particular group, using an official system
